nodes.text: Rolling with BB-8! is a young-readers storybook featuring material from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was published by Studio Fun International on February 2, 2016 and comprises ten pages. The book is adapted by Benjamin Harper and illustrated by Brian Rood. The cover features a spinning cutout of BB-8.
Follow the adventures of the newest droid from Star Wars: The Force Awakens!.
